title: Cocktail of the week: Southside Scran Pearfect recipe | The Good Mixer
text:
An autumnal gin cocktail that makes good use of apple, pear and nutty liqueur

A fruity, seasonal cocktail from the list at our restaurant, Southside Scran, in Edinburgh. The nutty, herbal notes of Frangelico work very well with apple and pear.

Pearfect

Serves 1

35ml gin (we use Tanqueray)

20ml fresh lime juice

15ml sugar syrup

25ml pear puree (homemade or bought in)

15ml Frangelico

15ml apple juice

1 pear fan garnish and a sprinkling of ground cinnamon, to finish

Put a big handful of ice in a shaker, add all the liquids and shake hard for 10 seconds. Double strain into a chilled cocktail glass – a Nick & Nora or coupe would be ideal – garnish with a pear fan and a sprinkle of cinnamon, and serve.
